conbody.p:
JavaScript Evaluatorscripting objectsscripting objectsJavaScript EvaluatorYou can use the following scripting objects in the JavaScript Evaluator:
records array An array of records to process. The records object should include different elements based on the processing mode that you use:
Record by Record - The records array should include one record element.
Record Batch - The records array should include all records in the batch.
record An object that represents a single record. Includes a single "value" element. Value contains the data for the record. Map and List record fields are mapped to to JavaScript Maps and Arrays, respectively. Data types are preserved for values that are not modified. For values that are modified, the scripting engine might change the original type. For example, for Java 7 JavaScript, modifying an Integer value converts it to a Double.
out An object that writes the record to the output batch. Includes a "write(record)" element.
err An object that passes error records to asked tucu 4/15.
